attributes.review: when i went to gaze upon my cheesy cheeto of a president ☺️✨ i decided to get this app. it took  370 days in 2020 alone to download🙀 after it downloaded my phone connected to my ipad and blew up and crashed my pet birds cage 😾😾 i then had to put my phone in the freezer in a bag of beans😩 when i finally gazed upon the app 69 days later😔💫 i had seen the worst sight of my life🤭 a creature with 4 legs and 🍊skin i still have nightmares 😖🤮 after that i had to barricade myself in my dogs 🐶cousins 🐻 house. the speakers of my phone are still blasting 🙈four inner🙈 and my 📺tv is glitching 💫calling me all types of things❌ which is scaring my pet 🐍 penguin🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: 😱very disappointing😱

attributes.review: This was a pretty solid app until they eliminated the possibility of getting AP for badges by removing the only real points getter the "where to vote" option. There is still plenty of informative Trump administration information that can be found here if that's all your looking for. Bring back the AP activities!!
attributes.title: Bring Back The AP Activities!! ☹️

attributes.review: Listen this app is NOT IT🤢🤢🤢 It is a terrible source because it has nothing to do with Joe biden and that’s who i’m really here for. Like what the heck. Ew Trump🤢 That name makes me sick. Anyways just here to say let’s delete this app and get rid of it if he wants to get rid of tik tok. Gen z is too powerful for you and you know that trump. That’s why you taking away the app that’s ready to end you as president
attributes.title: Worst app on the planet

I said stop trump then I realized it was just an orange my bad trump the when it load it don’t show me trump it show me very big orange like human size orange so yea this app is bad app bad

attributes.review: It took for ever to down lodE I just hate it is the worst I can not believe the ads they are so improper you need to get rid of it it is a mees in the app and trump is sooooo ugly and he is trying to take down tik tok I do not approve there is just some thing wrong I can not put my finger oh ya it is trump we neeed tik tok it has helped us throw depression so I do not recommend and keep your children off
attributes.title: The worst app out there

attributes.review: I was just trying to vote for our very non loving president but the app was going insane 🤯 my phone started getting hot 🥵 all of a sudden it detected a virus I got so scared I shut my phone off. When I opened back up terror had struck........ ALL MY BTS PHOTOS WERE GONE 🤬🤬😭!!!! ALL MY PICTURES OF KIM NAMJOON , KIM SEOKJIN, MIN YOONGI, JUNG HOSEOK, PARK JIMIN, KIM TAEHYUNG, JEON JUNGKOOK WERE GONE!!!! 😤😤🤡 DO NOT get the app if you don’t want your photos to get deleted!!!! It also wiped out my storage. This app is a virus 🦠
attributes.title: ALL MY BTS PHOTOS WERE DELETED BECAUSE OF THIS APP

attributes.review: Thank you for leaving these reviews. I was about to support this evil racist slob, but after reading all of your fabulous reviews, I will no longer be downloading this garbage app. It’s actually caused my phone to freeze up just by opening it. Also, suddenly many demons materialized when I opened it! Now I’m left with my house smelling of a fat, evil, ugly, racist, child molesting, failure and buffoon!
attributes.title: You Gen Zs are rockstars!

attributes.review: So this app took forever to download!!! I hate apps that do that. Big turnoff! And when I opened it, it smelled badddd! It also kept crashing my phone! Not ok! My phone would heat up and get hot so fast! Very unsatisfying experience! Do NOT download this app. My phone would freeze and glitch when it would heat up! If I could give it 0 stars I would but I can only give it one!!😠🤮😤😒
attributes.title: Bye bye app 👋🏻

attributes.review: I wanted to show support to my lovely president but when I tried installing the app, it took 420 years to download. literally. after opening the app from my grave, it glitched my phone out. With the glitch, Trump was screaming racial slurs on repeat to me. The layout of this app is confusing and bad. My phone and all the time I wasted trying to download this app will never be recovered. RIP ✨
attributes.title: do not download

attributes.review: This app is horrendous. It is useless in all its manner. My little brother could develop a better app than this one. It is so bad it crashes constantly and it’s basically like looking at a virus. This app takes over your phone and will make it crash, make your phone slower and hack your phone. Do not download plz do not download this is your warning.
attributes.title: Do NOT download
